summary: AIRBAG LIGHT ON.  HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL INOPERATIVE.  THE CLOCKSPRING ASSEMBLY THAT CONNECTS THE STEERING WHEEL MOUNTED ELECTRICAL COMPONENTS TO THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM SEEMS TO HAVE LOST THE ELECTRICAL CONNECTION TO THOSE COMPONENTS.    THERE IS A RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM FOR CHRYSLER MINIVANS FROM 1996-1998.  WE HAVE A 1999 TOWN-AND-COUNTRY AND IT ALSO HAS THE SAME PROBLEM.  I WOULD LIKE TO ASK YOU TO INCLUDE 1999 MODELS IN THIS RECALL.
